import React,{useContext,useState} from 'react' import {GlobalContext} from "./GlobalContext.js" function Cart() { const {transactions}=useContext(GlobalContext) const {deleteF} = useContext(GlobalContext) console.log("TRANSACTIONNADD",transactions.price) return (
{transactions.map((v)=>{return(<>
{v.name}
{deleteF(v.id)}}>x
)})}
{transactions.price.reduce((acc,item)=>{return(acc +=item)}) }
) } export default Cart
